title: Ministry of Health and Population (MoHP)
description: Central body for health governance in Nepal. Provides policies, national plans, health acts, and bulletins.
author: HealthGov Nepal

title: DHIS2 Platform
description: Open-source health management platform used by many governments, including Nepal, for digital health data collection and reporting.
author: DHIS2 Team

title: Health Management Information System (HMIS)
description: Nepal’s centralized reporting and analytics platform for health institutions, hospitals, and municipalities.
author: Department of Health Services

title: QGIS for Health Mapping
description: Free, open-source Geographic Information System widely used for health facility mapping, catchment analysis, and geospatial planning.
author: Open Source GIS Community

title: WHO Digital Health Atlas
description: Global directory of digital health initiatives to help governments and stakeholders coordinate and scale innovations.
author: WHO

title: Nepal Health Research Council (NHRC)
description: Provides national health research data, ethics approval guidelines, and publications to support evidence-based decision making.
author: NHRC Nepal
